function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cultural differences in perceiving and understanding recommendations for the built environment","Impact":"Misinterpretation of recommendations leading to ineffective implementation","Mitigation":"Incorporate cultural experts in the development of recommendations, provide culturally specific guidance materials","Technologies":"Cultural competency training programs, translation and localization tools","People":"Cultural communities, stakeholders in built environment projects","Owner":"Researchers, cultural experts"},{"Description":"Economic constraints impacting sustainable social development and vector-free built environment","Impact":"Inability to implement sustainable strategies, increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Poverty alleviation initiatives, educational campaigns, sustainable public health policies","Technologies":"Economic development tools, educational platforms, public health technology","People":"Communities affected by economic constraints, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, NGOs, research institutions"}]}
